title: V-011 blocked: Cannot verify rename while Ralph running
description: V-011 is a verification story for the rename from ralphtools → claude-golem, but cannot be verified until the directory is actually renamed. The directory rename cannot occur while Ralph is running in that directory. This is an infrastructure blocker that prevents the verification chain (V-011 → V-012 → US-065) from proceeding.

acceptanceCriteria.text: User must run scripts/rename-to-claude-golem.sh after rename
User must update ~/.zshrc as prompted by script
User must reload Ralph or start new session
